plot: A new infection that simply makes people feel happy is treated as a threat by the authorities while its "victims" work to spread it to others.
title: Qué hermosa es la vida
plot_es: A new infection that simply makes people feel happy is treated as a threat by the authorities while its "victims" work to spread it to others.
original_name: What's So Bad About Feeling Good?
plot_en: A new infection that simply makes people feel happy is treated as a threat by the authorities while its "victims" work to spread it to others.
